sentences.en: Sometimes the original abortion was done so badly that the uterus prolapsed.
sentences.cn: 有时最初的流产手术做得太糟糕，会引起子宫下垂。

sentences.en: Most of the neurons you have in your head, you had when you were in your mother's uterus.
sentences.cn: 你头脑中的大部分神经元，早在你处于母亲子宫中时就已经拥有。

sentences.en: If thawed semen is used, it has to be injected directly into the uterus through the ewe's belly wall.
sentences.cn: 如果使用解冻的精液，它必须通过母羊的腹壁直接注入子宫。
